EmailTemplate.subject: Five Star Cancellation Info
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.kugo2p__ContactBuying__c},
We have a three day cancellation period. Your order was placed on {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.kugo2p__OrderDate__c} and we are past the three days. You were published in the {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.Publication_Month__c} issue of {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.Market_Publication__c} as a Five Star winner.
We cannot cancel your order due to all the products that have been delivered or are in process at this time. Your order was placed on a finance free twelve month payment plan per your request. You have made * of the twelve payments. You can pay the balance due of {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.kugo2p__BalanceDueAmount__c} at any time. To be clear, this is a payment plan on a product package that you purchased it is not a monthly subscription you can cancel at any time.
I have attached a copy of your invoice and copied your Customer Success Representative and Account Manager in case you have questions for them about the products or use of them.
There is a great value in using the award you won as part of your marketing plan.
Thank you for your business and have a great day.
Accounts Receivable
Five Star Professional
Phone: (888) 608-7161
Email: billing@fivestarprofessional.com
